steps.title: Upload Your Text
steps.description: Click the 'Upload' button to select and add text files for translation. Ensure the file format is supported, such as TXT or DOCX. After uploading, the filename will display on the interface. Confirm everything is correct, then click confirm to continue the translation process.

steps.description: Carefully review the translated content to ensure accuracy. Compare the original text with the translation, paying attention to grammar, vocabulary, and sentence structure. Use online tools or dictionaries to verify difficult words. Read multiple times to ensure the translation is clear, fluent, and contextually appropriate.

steps.title: Download Results

After confirming your selection, the system will begin processing. Once complete, the file will automatically save from your browser, ensuring file integrity and accessibility.
